TopicTitle: Hey,anyone have some tips for making youtube video

Articles.Content:
Hey,im new on youtube and im making KSP and League of Legends

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqLnYHYSt52j1cEMZ_tNXoQ

If you have any tips,post them below,and constructive critics is always welcome

Nice job for your first video. The main tip is always have fun, and keep going. The more you do it, the better you get at the commentary, and if you're having fun, that will naturally come across to the viewer and they'll be more likely to want to see more.

I have started out too and the thing that helps me is to be enthusiastic in each episode, Dont have long episodes and make it fun and interact with the viewers buy asking them "what should i do next?" in the for the next video. Good Luck!!
